title: Creamy mushroom tarts
ingredients: ['Pastry', '200g plain flour', '100g butter', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon cold water', 'Filling', '450g mushrooms', '40g butter', '1/2 small onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '140ml cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'juice of 1 lemon', '1 pinch salt']
